subject: Automobile Racing
Concussions
Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy
Sports Injuries
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: When it comes to concussions and their lasting effects, Nascar drivers are largely on their own, though a new coalition of top teams may represent hope for help.
snippet: When it comes to concussions and their lasting effects, Nascar drivers are largely on their own, though a new coalition of top teams may represent hope for help.
